snippet: GLADSTONE FISCHBEIN-- Amy Jo, passed away on April 22 at the age of 56. She is survived by her daughters Ali and Nicole and her beloved mother Edie Gladstone and predeceased by her father Leonard Jay Gladstone. Amy was the founder and creative director of Amy Jo Gladstone Shoes. Amy faced her illness with determination, grace and courage. She will be sorely missed by all who had the good fortune to be in her life. A memorial service in honor of Amy will be held on Saturday, May 14 at 11:30am at The Unitarian Church on 10 Lyons Plains Road, Westport, Connecticut. 1/3
